706579f-a.text:
St. John's Place, west from Eighth Ave., showing Grace Methodist Episcopal Church at the right, and the Memorial Presbyterian Church at the
left, in the background.
August 2, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
706579f-a.folder: St. Johns Place & 8th Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

702462f-a.text:
8-24 Eighth Ave., west side, from but not including St. John's Place, to, but not including Lincoln Place, showing a typical row of Brownstone houses in this section of Brooklyn.

August 2, 1929.

P.L. Sperr.
